<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Ecology of the Witchwyrd](/Articles.aspx?ID=7)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad](/Sources.aspx?ID=14) pg. 64</row>

The strange and enigmatic Pactmasters of Katapesh are aliens from a distant world. Explore the mysteries of these [witchwyrds](/Monsters.aspx?ID=861)!
name: Ecology of the Witchwyrd
